data.description: Use other catalog formats in Maketext
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module provides Locale::Maketext frameworks with
    lexicon-handling capabilities to read from other localization
    formats, such as Gettext, Msgcat, and so on.

    It is used by CPANPLUS, RT and other projects, and is essential for
    Perl I18N projects that wish to use the GNU Gettext toolchain and
    Maketext framework.
